refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions providing a palette selection dialog.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Functions providing a palette selection dialog.

refsect2.title: GimpRunPaletteCallback ()
gimp_palette_select_new ()
gimp_palettes_popup ()
refsect2.para: This procedure opens the palette selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: The callback PDB proc to call when palette selection is made.
Title of the palette selection dialog.
The name of the palette to set as the first selected.

refsect2.title: gimp_palettes_close_popup ()
refsect2.para: This procedure closes an opened palette selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: The name of the callback registered for this pop-up.

refsect2.title: gimp_palettes_set_popup ()
refsect2.para: Sets the current palette in a palette selection dialog.
Sets the current palette in a palette selection dialog.

listitem.simpara: The name of the callback registered for this pop-up.
The name of the palette to set as selected.
